definition: shade (of a color, i.e. light or dark)
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
severity (of the case)/degree of seriousness/whether sth is slight or serious
to favor one and discriminate against the other (abbr. for 厚此薄彼[hou4 ci3 bo2 bi3])
